name: cextools
short_description: Some small command line programs and a file parser for Concept Explorer (conexp) written in C++. Currently features include: Converters from concept explorer into PDF, PostScript, SVG and PovRay, a modified 3D Freese layout.
summary: Command line helpers for Conexp files.
